21.4.7075529


in android-project\app\build.gradle
----------------------------------------------
set applicationId  default is "org.libsdl.app"
set compileSdkVersion
set minSdkVersion
set targetSdkVersion
set APP_PLATFORM in externalNativeBuild.ndkBuild



apk outputs to android-project\app\build\outputs\apk\debug





build menu
